features: 【Retro Game System】This is a retro TV video game consoles of the 80s of the last century, it collected a lot of last century game. Built-in 108 FC games, 108 classic games recover your childrenhood memory. No need to pre-install the games and insert a card. It has all the classic games in 80s - 90s you know and love, You can easily find 30-40 games that belong to your favorite classic game. This is a game console full of retro memories, perfect for playing with your partner and children

【Games & Clock Modes】Games and clock channels can be switched at will. When it is automatically dormant, the gaming console will wake up as an electronic clock. 3.0-inch high-definition display, bringing you more realistic game pictures. You can protect your eyes by adjusting the screen contrast and lightness. The mini TV style design make this game device look likes a artwork, retro frame antique design will add funky retro decorative feel to your bedroom, bedside, bookcase, TV table, etc.

【Portable & Long Use Time】Built-in 1200mAh lithium rechargeable battery, lasting 20 hours of battery life! Continuous playback for 4 hours. Support fast charging with USB cable. The retro mini TV game console with super compact size, very convenient to bring outside to play with your friends. Also support 4*AA battery (not included) power supply. Flexible power supply will bring you a lot of joy and happiness during the trip or long journey.

【TV-Out & Dual 2.4GH Wireless Controllers】Enjoy your retro TV handheld game console on a big TV screen by using the AV cable included in the packing box. Clearer and more vivid images bring exciting gaming experience and better eye protection. This vintage gaming console comes with two 2.4Ghz wireless controllers, support 2-person interactive games and single-player games to share your happiness with family and friends at any time, allowing you to return to a happy childhood.

【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adults】Ideal gift for kids and adults on birthday, Christmas Day or any occasion. This game console can definitely surprise you and your child. 1-Year Reliable Warranty! We promise that if it accidentally breaks within 30 days, please send us an email and we will replacement it for free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep your brain busy This exciting video game console comes preloaded with a variety of fun single or two player games that will develop fast thinking and flexible fingers, making you endless aftertaste! You'll be addicted to beating this challenging game. There is no age limit to such fun. The whole family can enjoy the fun of GV300S. Built in 308 retro games, includes sports, adventure, shooting, racing, chess,fighting and puzzle games as well as thinking and learning games involving memory, math, and logic. No Wi-Fi? No problem! You can play games in cars, airplanes, and wherever you want to play. Turn off the sound or turn it up for maximum fun. GV300S is a video game that won't bore you wherever you go.

Packing list 1*TV Game Console 1* Gamepads 1*USB Charging Cable 1*Built-in Li-ion Batteries 1*Built-in Li-ion Batteries 1*ABS ANT 1*Manual More scientific appearance design! Inspired by the game consoles of the 80's and incorporating modern technology to show a more excellent gaming performance experience! The design of retro TV adds modern and fashionable elements to make it look more lovely.

Support two-player games You can play single-player games or two people at the same time. Double-player games can exercise the habit of collaboration between two people, so as to develop a sense of team. (Note: Two-player mode requires the purchase of a separate game controller) USB Rechargeable , comfortable to use Built-in a rechargeable lithium battery, providing a steady stream of energy for your child's happiness. It also eliminates the parents from buying and replacing batteries frequently. Lots of classic retro games pre-installed Designed for children and adults ages 4 to 106, the GV300S packs fun and adventure into a compact video game console that's easy to carry around and entertain on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So great- total retro goodness!
reviews.reviewText: All the games we love in on package. The screen is tiny which can be fun for a minute- but then, guess what? You can hook it up to your big screen! Genius- love this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun!
reviews.reviewText: I was really surprised at how easy this was to play. Controller is just like the original. There are A LOT of games in this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I’m pretty happy with this purchase. I wasn’t sure what to expect but I was pleasantly surprised. Ton of games and even connects to tv. Picture quality is not perfect but I’m okay with that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this for the kids to show them how games use to look back in the day. my husband and i had so much fun playing the games on it. It was soooo many games. We hooked it to our big screen tho. we did not like it that we could not players without a second remote. only one comes with it. we tried to put it on 2 players and just use the one and it did not work. I do not know if it is every game on there but the ones that we tried to play did not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini game system
reviews.reviewText: Fun little game system to have. Any kid or adult would enjoy playing for hours. Battery last for a long time and is easy to navigate. Recommend 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this thing!
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical on how this would operate, if at all and I was pleasantly surprised and even a little shocked. All you have to do is put batteries in the "TV" part and the controller and it's ready to go. Turning the bottom knob switches it on and adjusts the volume and then it brings you to a screen where the games are categorized. Some games have typos and some are renamed so it takes a bit to find what you're looking for but I found my favorites - tetris and Mario - so I'm happy. It's been awesome to have on long car rides and even looks cute on the shelf when it isn't in use. I think everyone born in the 80s and 90s should have one of these! It's one of the coolest things I've ever gotten from Amazon.
